This game is honestly a huge mixed bag, some parts of this game is super fun and other parts are pretty bad. Mainly the game play is fun and solid, either side you play survivor, or killer is at the end of the day is enjoyable however there are two main issues with this game: Progression and Community.

Progression for either side is pretty slow, a good killer match will net you about 30K blood points at default while a good survivor match will be about half of that. However 90% of the good perks you'll want to run are whats called "teach-ables" which means that they are tied to certain characters, which have to be leveled up to lvl 30,35 or 40 depending on the perk in order to have the chance on unlocking them on separate characters. Every build thats worth anything is built upon mostly teach-ables, coming from different characters with 1 maybe 2 default perks, meaning not only is there a grind in order to put together a decent character but more than likely you are going to be forced to buy DLC in order to get the optimal perks that you need, which can be expensive unless there's a sale going on.

Community on the other hand is a larger issue, if you don't mind the grind there is a toxic community that plagues the game. One quick look at the steam forums and you'll see endless "X needs to be nerfed" or "The game is obviously survivor/killer sided" so on and so forth. Realistically most of these complaints are fairly easy to work around, "OP" killer perks often have a downside or specific triggers which can be dealt with or danced around while "OP" survivor perks can be easily dealt with as well with the bare minimal amount of forethought. Realistically there are SOME perks that need to be nerfed but the player base claims that any perk worth anything is OP and too good. Not to mention that this toxicity has led to a frequent DC issue with people leaving mid game, plenty of killers are babies enough that if you teabag or click a flashlight at them that they will leave the game, and as a killer main I've seen more than my fair share of people DCing away from the match just because they aren't winning or being blatantly stupid, like unhooking people within 5 seconds of me hooking them and being surprised when I turn around and slap em around. 

However despite all of this I still find the game to be pretty fun, playing mostly as a killer is very fun as the early MMR rankings isn't too bad and once you get up to the higher ranks you'll encounter survivors that can give you a significant run for your money, while as a survivor it is a bit rough at first but with a vast majority of the player base maining survivors once you get 1 or 2 valuable perks and a few brain cells to rub together you stand a much higher chance of surviving each match. You'll have to decide for your self though if this game is worth the downsides, for some it is but for most people I wouldn't recommend this game despite enjoying it my self, mostly because I can ignore the toxicity.

tl;dr Game play its self is fun but progression is grindy and the player base are mostly at the mentality level of a 4 year old.

It's certainly fun if you can manage your anger (lol).

I say so because life can be hard playing as killer since it's a lonely road. The game is balanced between a strong killer and 4 weak survivors, so teamwork is really the key. If you have anger issues, you'll probably struggle when good teams show you that the killer isn't that stronger after all.

However, playing as survivor isn't much different if you're not playing with friends. It's rare to have a good teamwork with random people once there's no in-game communication.

So take the lonely killer road if you're more into single playing. Or get together with friends and try to survive. Either way, keep yourself cool and laugh at everything. That way you'll easily spend hours with it.

O jogo é muito bom amo esse game de coração, mas acabei desenvolvendo umas coisinhas como psicopatia, depressão, TOC, ataque de pânico, transtorno bipolar e estresse pós traumático. 

Fora isso tudo bem. 

As DLC's tem algumas que não valem a pena que só acrescenta alguns itens cosméticos, mas a maioria é MUITO legal pois adiciona principalmente uns killers legais.

Значит так,сыграв в эту игру почти 100 часов могу сказать что игра постоянно радует обновлениями,жаль только в основном донатными) Играть с друзьями весело и особо не горит как в кс или доте) Прокачиваешь персонажей,карт много.Порог вхождения в игру очень низкий и вас не будет первые 50 часов все разносить.Все по уровням распределено. Визуал довольно приятен и только иногда есть моменты где графика немного не совподает с реальностью происходящего.Заметил что после 10 вечера примерно по Москве в игре намного меньше людей и поиск игры занимает больше времени. В целом игра годная,советую,моя оценка 8 из 10

Puntos positivos: 
#Una buena comunidad con una baja toxicidad
#Gráficos más que aceptables 
#Tiene mucho contenido
#Es un juego muy original y no se basa completamente en un solo género ya que puede ser un juego de terror multiplayer y ser a su vez competitivo.
Puntos negativos:
#Una optimización no tan buena.
#Todos sus dlcs cuestan más que el propio juego.
#Tiene un matchmaking deficiente que coloca gente de rango bajo contra gente de rango MUY alto.

O jogo em si, é um jogo que vai muito além de apenas sobreviver ou matar. É um jogo onde você precisa pensar em cada jogada que você irá fazer. Como sobrevivente, você tem que analisar como o seu oponente (Assassino) joga, para assim, você conseguir se manter vivo. Como assassino, cada erro pode custar a sua partida inteira, por isso a melhor forma é você montar uma boa estratégia para que consiga vencer. A diversão é o que importa!
